Tolerance: Edges are considered matching if both pairs of endpoint vertices are closer than this distance
bOnlyUnique: Only merge unambiguous pairs that have unique duplicate-edge matches
bResolveTJunctions: If enabled, after an initial attempt at Welding, attempt to resolve remaining open edges in T-junction configurations via edge splits, and then retry Weld
AttrWeldingMode: Controls split-attribute welding performed after the Mesh weld.  Applies to normals, tangents, UVs and colors.
SplitNormalThreshold: Threshold on the angle between normals used to determine if split normals should be merged
SplitTangentsThreshold: Threshold on the angle between tangent used to determine if split tangents should be merged
SplitUVThreshold: Threshold uv-distance used to determine if split UVs should be merged
SplitColorThreshold: Threshold color-distance used to determine if split colors should be merged
